The prompt manager to use for generating prompts.
The moderator to use for moderating input passed to the model and the output
Optional. The prompt to use for the current turn.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Optional. The history options to use for the AI system
Docs.remarks: Defaults to tracking history with a maximum of 3 turns and 1000 tokens per turn.

Docs.summary: The planner to use for generating plans.
Optional. The prompt to use for the current turn.
Docs.remarks: This allows for the use of the AI system in a free standing mode. An exception will be thrown if the AI system is routed to by the Application object and a prompt has not been configured.
